body.description: HARD WORKING, LONG LASTING Your haircare should work as hard as you do. Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Conditioner visibly replenishes dry hair for softness and hydration. This formula contains 2x more nutrients for 72 plus hours of softness. This moisturizing conditioner is color-safe and crafted with protective anti-oxidants, strengthening lipids, and pH balancers for rich hair hydration, leaving you with strong and healthy strands. With Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Conditioner, say goodbye to dry locks and unleash soft, hydrated hair that looks and feels beautiful for longer. Plus, a Miracle Rescue Intense Rescue Shot is included to help deeply repair current signs of hair damage. 2X MORE NUTRIENTS, LASTS FOR 72 PLUS HOURS This Pantene Pro-V Conditioner is designed to be used with our complete Moisture Renewal Collection has 2x more nutrients to infuse your hair with optimal hydration. These powerful Moisture Renewal formulas work together to permeate every strand, fighting damage where it starts and hydrating hair from the inside out for results that last 72 plus hours without washing. These formulas are crafted with Pro-V nutrients, protective anti-oxidants, Pro-Vitamin B5, and pH balancers, and made without parabens or colorants. TO USE Massage Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Conditioner into your cleansed, damp hair, making sure to pay special attention to your ends. Rinse thoroughly. For best results use with Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo. This color-safe hair moisturizer is gentle enough for everyday use on chemically-treated hair or color-treated hair, and gives you results that last for 72 plus hours without washing. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good, my hair is silky and aligned without getting heavy, it is loose and super hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides sufficient moisture for 4B natural hair
reviews.reviewText: I have high porosity 4b natural hair and this gives me the moisture my hair craved. I would use products with so many oils and butters in them and they left my hair as dry as the desert. This along with Pantene's shampoo of the same line (moisture) has kept my hair from having excessive breakage so I have now bought them in bulk! I hope Pantene doesn't change this product because it's a shame how companies will experiment with different ingredients and the next thing you know the products that worked for you are discontinued and you go back to having the same hair problems as before because their new products become trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So convenient to order online instead of going to the store. Love the scent and always keeps my hair soft and shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing, good for those extremely dry 4 type hair . Best when used when de tangling hair only issue is it flakes up natural hair terribly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use pump, and the conditioner works so well. You don’t have to leave it on long, and your hair is very easy to comb and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using for years
reviews.reviewText: This was a great deal. I have been using Pantene for over 20 years and stopped during Covid because it got expensive, but I’m so happy I’m back to using it, you can literally see the difference in my hair’s health. There is a review that the product is counterfeit because it’s distributed by Procter & Gamble (P&G), but that is a corporation that distributes goods and well known in many name stores we shop at. Get it while it’s a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: if you want soft shiny hair, this is the product for you especially if you color your hair ! once I had to use something else after my luggage was temporarily lost and nothing compares to this wonderful conditioner.
